attributes.action: Be aware that we don't want to see you elevating Patrick Rock to ermine.
attributes.additional_details: Now the attempted cover up has failed and we now know your protege is EMINENTLY qualified and suited for elevation to ermine you really should be aware that should you do it, because we also know there is no rock (pun not intended) you will not slide under to help your political friends, probably driven by your morbid fear that if he is not elevated he will reveal home truths about your tenure in Number 10, it WILL be the final nail in your political coffin, Mr Cameron.
